rdf:Description.dc:title: Adult literacy in Northern Alberta : position paper 1989 position paper /
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Northern Alberta Development Council.
Elliott, Bob.
rdf:Description.dc:description: Examines existing level of literacy in six northern communities and types of literacy projects available, in view of public concern over the lack of adult writing and reading skills in northern Alberta. Includes nine recommendations to combat problems.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Literacy
